message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a very reasonable price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is its true value, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
